# PaintX Art Gallery

> Canonical site: https://www.paintx.art
> Purpose: Original paintings marketplace and gallery pages.

## Preferred entry points
- Home: https://www.paintx.art/
- Artwork pages: https://www.paintx.art/art/[slug]
- Artist pages: https://www.paintx.art/artist/[slug]
- Style pages: https://www.paintx.art/style/[slug]
- Medium pages: https://www.paintx.art/medium/[slug]
- Canvas pages: https://www.paintx.art/canvas/[slug]

## Sitemaps / crawling
- Sitemap: https://www.paintx.art/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://www.paintx.art/robots.txt

## Trust / contact
- Contact intent: use on-page Contact CTA on artwork detail pages.

## Content notes
- Do not invent artist facts, provenance, awards, or pricing claims beyond page data.
- Use page canonical URLs when citing artwork or artist information.
